title: Genus Epitheca
description: **_Epitheca_** is a genus of dragonflies in the family Corduliidae. They are commonly known as **baskettails**. They are large, strong fliers, most often seen cruising over open water, rarely perched. The single European species (more occur in Japan and especially North America) is a shy, brownish corduliid, with boldly marked wings and without green metallic colours.
